website_summaries.verdict: Effective ingredients including salicylic acid work against acne and other impurities that our skin readily absorbs.
pros: This foaming cleanser packs a double punch, treating acne better than many over-the-counter brands and also leaving skin balanced and not stripped of all essential oils
cons: We love this product for  fighting acne, however it may not be suited for normal skin

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is good but since the price increased over $9 in a months time, I won’t buy again on here. I found it somewhere else cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: debbie stack

customer_reviews.title: Great for adult acne and oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser so much for my adult acne and oily skin. It got 4 Stars this time because it was shipped without a cap.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for acne
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended I buy this and use it only in the morning and I love how it doesn't strip my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Ane

customer_reviews.title: Work the money
customer_reviews.text: I love it that’s the work I have acne but this product is really good for that
customer_reviews.author: Yoselin

customer_reviews.title: Good, no frills AHA/BHA cleanser
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a mild daily cleanser with both alpha and beta hydroxy acids, this is a good option. It uses gentle surfactants and has no fragrance or unnecessary filler ingredients. The packaging and pump mechanism is likewise simple yet high quality, it doesn't feel flimsy like some foaming pump mechanisms on cheap hand soaps. I would give it 5 stars if the price were a bit lower. That said, if you only use one pump this should last quite a while and the price is in line with other premium skincare lines such as DDF and Murad.
customer_reviews.author: tangent

customer_reviews.title: Foam acne cleanser with 2% Salicylic Acid for cleansing to prevent acne or treat milder breakouts of acne
customer_reviews.text: This Replenix Acne Solutions Gly/Sal 2-2 Foaming works well enough for 29-yr old adult skin that is once again dealing with acne breakouts long after treatment with Accutane seemed to eradicate it. Replenix is not on par with 2.5% Benzoyl Peroxide products, however, some individuals do not need 2.5% Benzoyl Peroxide or cannot tolerate the harshness of it, so this product is an excellent alternative. It is a foam, which is wonderful and preferred to liquids/gels/bars. It goes on where you want it and stays on your face. It removes makeup very well, but cannot be used for eye makeup removal safely.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eye

customer_reviews.title: It feels very good, no fragrance as other may have a strong ...
customer_reviews.text: With just a little bit of product, you will have enough foam for all of your face and neck. It feels very good, no fragrance as other may have a strong scent, this one is perfect. It dramatically has changed the appearance of my skin, and me helped me with acne and clean dirt. Leaving the skin clear with natural brightness. My skin type is oily and I hate it, this helps me control that too. You can see (and feel) results from the first use, but if you continue the routine for at least two weeks, you wouldn’t be happier. I highly recommend this, no matter the age you are or the skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana

customer_reviews.title: Funny odor. Two squirts of foam though does the ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottle warns that this foam can dry your skin out a bit. I counteracted that with moisturizing cream and I'm not having a real issue. I found this to be a decent makeup remover too except you can't use it around your eyes or lips, which makes it a pain in the butt for cleansing the face and removing makeup. It also rather stinks. Funny odor. Two squirts of foam though does the trick and it washes off easily and quickly. No cloth needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: works well, foam is nice
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see a change in my skin with this product, but given that I swapped from a cleanser that I already liked, that's not bad. This seems to clean well and also be mild. I didn't see any dryness or irritation. I'm in my late 30's, with combination skin that's still acne prone but clear due to my regimen. I do like the foam, as I feel that it works with less product compared to a gel and rinses easily.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Todd

customer_reviews.title: I love the foaming action!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice cleanser that works well on my face. The foaming pump makes this go a long way. It left my face feeling clean, and it rinsed away well. It also worked really well when washing off my foundation. So far, I really like it. I don't have a major problem with acne, I just have the occasional breakout. I am hoping that this produce will help with that.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Girl

customer_reviews.title: Can cause "excessive drying"
customer_reviews.text: The bottle has multiple warnings on it that this product can cause excessive drying. It also says to only use it during a breakout. I only have occasional breakouts and my skin is super dry already. I wish the product description had been more forthcoming.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Strong cleanser for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cleanser for oily skin. As usual with this kind of stuff, I'm not sure it does any actual acne fighting. It is pretty strong and I only use it every couple of days or else I get drying. I like how light and scent-free it is.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Clucker

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work well for my skin, left a residue and felt dryer afterward
customer_reviews.author: N. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent foaming cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is a vey good cleanser that removes oils and make-up well, foams nicely, has no scent, and is very gentle. But by using this cleanser alone, she did not experience any improvement in acne.
customer_reviews.author: Rivendell

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: Top quality smoothing face cleanser with acne fighting power. Really like this product!
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. Makes my face feels very clean and refereshed.
customer_reviews.author: Mae Day

product_meta.title: Replenix Acne Solutions Gly/Sal 2-2 Foaming Cleanser, 6.7 Fl oz
product_meta.description:
Replenix Gly/Sal 2-2 Foaming Acne Cleanser works into a luxurious foam to gently clear away excess oil, impurities and bacteria. This gentle cleansing foam leaves the skin feeling rejuvenated and renewed, and is specially formulated and pH balanced to provide optimum results for sensitive and acne prone skin. All Replenix and Replenix CF formulations are non-comedogenic and can be incorporated into your existing skin care routine. These exceptional products offer gentle yet effective productivity, allowing them to be used by sensitive skin types. Achieve healthier, more beautiful skin by harnessing the power of Replenix.

BRAND STORY
Replenix pharmaceutical-grade formulas combine natural green tea polyphenols with other proven anti-aging ingredients like hyaluronic acid, peptides, caffeine and retinol to rejuvenate your complexion.
